name: The Last Duskreaper
description:
Ashley is a brave little bird. Following the call of one of her old friends, she returns to her native kingdom, the Immortal Shadow Lands. She discovers that this world is invaded by glitched and weird monsters , the anomalies, created by a mysterious Scarlet Ghost.

Ashley and her friend Poe, takes the initiative of ridding this world of what gnaws at it at the request of the king himself. But who knows what dark secrets are hidden by Poe, the Scarlet Ghost, the origins of the anomalies and the kingdom or Ash herself? Our little bird, in this adventure, will never be at the end of its surprises.

Inspired by the fabulous work of Team Cherry on their masterpiece, Hollow Knight, this game will test its player in an adventure through the many territories that compose the world that offers itself in a totally open way in this platformer hardcore metroidvania. So what are you waiting for to try your luck?
